attributes.htmlcode:
<style>
body
{
	background: url("/81f2ebdc-4ee6-4c87-905d-f82df0b61501.res");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top;
	font-family: Arial, Myriad Pro;

}



a, a:active, a:hover, a:focus, div {
	outline:none !important;
}

body.isolated
{
	background: url("/1739c82e-81fb-465d-a911-0e4e9731376b.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x !important;
	background-position:top !important;

}
body.no-subhead
{
	background: url("/92ede430-a533-41e9-9026-761603c3b7f8.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x !important;
	background-position:top !important;

}

body.no-subhead-sf
{
	background:#e3e3dd url("/92ede430-a533-41e9-9026-761603c3b7f8.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x !important;
	background-position:top !important;

}

.one-string {
	overflow:hidden !important;
	height:32px;
}

/* PROSHARE v2 MACROS*/

.macros-text {
text-decoration: none;
background-image: url("/0fae0c42-6f48-4558-8bea-e3a652ec1994.png");
background-repeat: no-repeat;
background-position: left top;
padding-top: 5px;
}
.macros-text span {
	border-bottom: 1px dotted #000080;
}

/* END OF PROSHARE v2 MACROS*/


/* DIRECTORY CONTENTS*/

.directory_object_locked {
	background-image: url('/ab902279-7e9c-494d-b7f9-307d9b48e65f.res');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	width: 11px;
    height: 15px;
	cursor: pointer;
}

.directory_object_unlocked {
	background-image: url('/9c10502c-b2cc-4a25-b9dd-33d9c26b1afd.res');
	background-repeat: no-repeat;
	width: 11px;
    height: 15px;
	cursor: pointer;
}

/* END OF DIRECTORY CONTENTS*/


/* PROSHARE v2 SMART-FOLDER-SELECTED*/
.smart-folder-selected {
	list-style:none;
	width: 410px;
	height: 90px;
	display: block;
	overflow: auto;
}
 .smart-folder-selected ul li{
    float:left;
	line-height: 25px;
	margin-right: 7px;
}
.smart-folder-selected ul li img {
margin-right: 3px;
}

/* END OF PROSHARE v2 SMART-FOLDER-SELECTED*/



/* PROSHARE v2 BUTTONS*/

.proshare-add-button {

	background: url("/e2f6e4d7-9d9d-4420-8586-6bfab8a1e829.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.proshare-upload-button {

	background: url("/d7b5021e-641a-4bd4-86c9-8231430d2108.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.proshare-delete-button {

	background: url("/0b6db8b4-6b48-4f1c-bdc5-064ed3cc59b1.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-delete-button.disabled {

	background: url("/4ba8ddad-e60b-4f8c-987b-7b61487f2b7f.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;

}
.proshare-delete-button.disabled span{
	color: #878787 !important;
}


.proshare-download-button {

	background: url("/10ff8df1-6731-4c01-90ca-c3d4215696cd.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-download-button.disabled {

	background: url("/f56b1652-e617-4015-992b-04548e5b77b9.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-download-button.disabled span{
	color: #878787 !important;
}

.proshare-edit-button {

	background: url("/bbe4b76a-a8e0-40a9-901b-e4d31ab60f08.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-edit-button.disabled {

	background: url("/e3e99764-c866-4492-ae78-07e4a6535ff9.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-edit-button.disabled span{
	color: #878787 !important;
}

.proshare-smart-folder {

	background: url("/c64ff8e3-a225-434a-aba3-a9f861df7bee.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.proshare-smart-folder.disabled {

	background: url("/88616eab-2fe2-4df8-a9af-17d6f4ad0e76.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-smart-folder.disabled span{
	color: #878787 !important;
}

.proshare-rights-btn {

	background: url("/b0f18b86-f9d2-44a4-bfda-66eafd206ec0.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.proshare-rights-btn.disabled {

	background: url("/36cbd63d-44c8-40a0-a0c0-ed86b70997ec.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}
.proshare-rights-btn.disabled span{
	color: #878787 !important;
}

.button-cont {
background: white url("/c5f37985-06ea-4110-8a03-f6ad8c30926d.png");
background-repeat: repeat-x;
background-position: bottom center;
border: 1px solid #BEBEBE;
border-radius: 5px;
-moz-border-radius: 5px;
-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
}


/* END OF PROSHARE v2 BUTTONS*/

.list-path{
	cursor:pointer;

}


/* PROSHARE v2 TABLE*/


.proshare-table .thead{
	border-top: 1px solid #d9d9d9;
	border-bottom: 1px dotted #d9d9d9;
	padding-bottom: 15px;
}

.proshare-table tbody tr td img {
padding-right: 5px;
}

.proshare-table tbody tr td {
cursor: pointer
}

.proshare-table table{
	height: 0px;
    border: 0;
	border-collapse: collapse;
	text-align: left;
}

.proshare-table table tr th{
	border: 0px;
	text-align: left;
}
.proshare-table table tr td{
	border: 0px;
	text-align: left;
}
.proshare-table .th-cell-0{
	width: 20px;
}
.proshare-table .th-cell-1{
	width: 350px;
}
.proshare-table .th-cell-2{
	width: 150px;
}
.proshare-table .th-cell-3{
	width: 90px;
	text-align: right;
}
.proshare-table td.cell-3{
	text-align: right;
}
.proshare-table .th-cell-4{
	width: 190px;
	text-align: right;
}
.proshare-table td.cell-4{
	text-align: right;
}
.proshare-table .th-cell-5{
	opacity: 0;
}
.proshare-table td.cell-5{
	padding-left: 10px;
}



/* END OF PROSHARE v2 TABLE*/

/* PROSHARE v2 POP-UPS*/

.gray-back {
	padding: 15px;
	background-color: #eee;

}

/* END OF PROSHARE v2 UPS*/






.page-caption {
font-size:24px !important;
}

.add-button {

	background: url("/e2f6e4d7-9d9d-4420-8586-6bfab8a1e829.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.add-button-horizontal {

	background: url("/5e25803a-db56-4589-9c2d-932ffc8f4896.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:middle left;
	padding-left:16px;
	text-align:left;
	font-size:13px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#548000 !important;
}
.add-button-horizontal span {
font-size:14px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#548000 !important;
}

.delete-button
{
	background:url("/0b6db8b4-6b48-4f1c-bdc5-064ed3cc59b1.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:10px!important;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.delete-button-horizontal {

	background: url("/ba82d0f9-8dff-4476-be8b-ac2d881dfc80.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:middle left;
	padding-left:16px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:13px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#db0000 !important;
}
.delete-button-horizontal span {
font-size:14px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#db0000 !important;
}

/* Top_menu */

	.top-menu-item
	{
		font-size:12px!important;
		color:#3d3d3d;
		text-align:center;
	}

	.m-active
	{
		border:1px solid #d9d9d9;
		border-bottom:none;
		border-top:1px solid #f6f6f6;
		background:#f6f6f6;
	}

/* end of Top_menu */

/* Tab navigation */

	.tabNavigation li
	{
		font-size:14px;
	}

	.tabNavigation li a
	{
		font-size:14px;
		text-decoration:none;
		background:#fff url("/ed8ab539-b353-431e-951c-c9121de57f93.png") ;
		background-repeat:repeat-x ;
		background-position:bottom left ;
		border-radius:4px;
		-moz-border-radius:4px;
		-webkit-border-radius:4px;
		padding:5px;
	}

	.tabNavigation li a.active
	{
		font-size:14px;
		text-decoration:none;
		background:#ffef95;
		border-radius:4px;
		-moz-border-radius:4px;
		-webkit-border-radius:4px;
		padding:5px;
		box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 5px #dcc751;
		-moz-box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 5px #dcc751;
		-webkit-box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 5px #dcc751;

	}

/* end of Tab navigation */

/* Settings page */

	.proadmin-big-button
	{
		border:1px solid #d4d4d4;
		border-radius:8px;
		-moz-border-radius:8px;
		-webkit-border-radius:8px;

	}

	.proadmin-big-button:hover
	{
		border-color:#FF0042;
	}

	.proadmin-big-button-active
	{
		border-color:#BD202F;
	}

	.proadmin-big-button a span,.proadmin-big-button a
	{
		color:#000!important;
		font-size:14px!important;
		text-decoration:none!important;
	}

	.proshare-management
	{
		background:#fff url(/PUT-GUID-THERE.png);
		background-repeat:repeat-x;
		background-position:bottom right;
	}

	.remote-scm
	{
		background:#fff url(/7268dd57-4bc2-448c-9bb2-06dedafeb8c2.png);
		background-repeat:repeat-x;
		background-position:bottom right;
	}

	.rules-management
	{
		background:#fff url(/ed6b3122-85e7-4f9c-bda6-1cda5c6ddb77.png);
		background-repeat:repeat-x;
		background-position:bottom right;
	}

	.users-management
	{
		background:#fff url(/e5cdc6f3-cd0a-436b-91d9-1f897b29e8d9.png);
		background-repeat:repeat-x;
		background-position:bottom right;
	}

	.plugins
	{
		background:#fff url(/5a20b04b-dec8-448d-9c94-bf9414417f69.res);
		background-repeat:repeat-x;
		background-position:bottom right;
	}

/* end of Settings page */

/* rules page */

	.acl_container {
		background: url(/1109f097-c6b3-4ede-ae6e-535301827d6d.png) right top repeat-y;
	}

	.acl_container_title {
		margin-top: -16px;
		font-size: 8pt;
		color: #666666;
	}

	.acl_container_user {
		background: url(/b2a8a4da-0244-42a9-b79d-f1f84f78adbf.png) left top no-repeat;
		padding-left: 20px;
		cursor: pointer;
	}

	.acl_container_group {
		background: url(/e36e3b08-eaf3-43c6-9a0d-41925d8f04fb.png) left top no-repeat;
		padding-left: 20px;
		cursor: pointer;
	}

	.acl_object_icon {
		background: url(/36ececa3-418e-4228-8d02-f6e4961b4432.png) left center no-repeat;
		padding-left: 20px;
		cursor: pointer;
	}

	.acl_app_object_icon {
		background: url(/e6c98120-54d5-46c4-978f-c2d62d98c44d.png) left center no-repeat;
		margin-left: -20px;
		padding-left: 20px;
		cursor: pointer;
	}

	.container_white {
		background-color: #f6f6f6;
	}

	.acl_small_button {
		background: #D9D9D9 url("/9718981f-a2eb-48b2-96d6-ef86df29ab48.res") left top repeat-x;
		border: 1px #d7d7d7 solid;
		border-radius: 8px;
		-moz-border-radius:8px;
		-webkit-border-radius: 8px;

		height: 18px !important;
		padding-right: 15px;
		font-style: none !important;
		text-decoration: none !important;
	}

	.acl_small_button:hover {
		background: #eCeCeC;
	}

	.acl_small_button span {
		font-size: 9px !important;
		color: #000 !important;
		text-align: right !important;
	}

	.acl_apply {
		background: url("/af2c2160-12ec-44de-bf0c-dd7be976c0c5.png") left 75% no-repeat;
		margin-left: 4px;
		line-height: 16px !important;
	}

	.acl_cancel {
		background: url("/56eae19a-c6e1-42bb-929f-95018f969d2d.png") left 75% no-repeat;
		margin-left: 4px;
		line-height: 16px !important;
	}

/* end of rules page*/



/* users and groups page*/


	.datatable-find-users table{
		height:0px;
		border:0px;
		border-collapse:collapse;
		line-height:28px;
	}

	.datatable-find-users table td{
		border:0px;
		border-bottom:1px dotted #bfbfbf;
	}
	.datatable-find-users table .cell-0 {
		width:32px !important;
	}

/* end of users and groups page*/


/* rulse_simple page */

.admin-datatable table{
height:0px !important;
border-collapse:collapse;
border:0px;
margin-top:10px;
}

.admin-datatable table .thead {
background:#fff url("/47120d64-b991-40a3-85ef-caf3e6dc07e2.png");
background-repeat:repeat-x;
background-position:bottom right;
border:0px;
border-top:1px solid #ececec;
border-bottom:1px solid #ececec;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead .th-cell {
border:0px;
text-align:left;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead .th-cell-0{
border:0px;
border-left:1px solid #ececec;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
	width:32px;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead .th-cell-2{
border:0px;
border-right:1px solid #ececec;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}
.admin-datatable table tr td{
border:0px;
text-align:left;
border-bottom:1px dotted #bfbfbf;
line-height:27px;
cursor:pointer;
}

/* end of rulse_simple page */

.datatable-find-users table{
height:0px;
border:0px;
border-collapse:collapse;
line-height:28px;
}

.datatable-find-users table td{
border:0px;
border-bottom:1px dotted #bfbfbf;
}
.datatable-find-users table .cell-0 {
width:32px !important;
}

/* SMART FOLDER */

.proshare_thumb_view {
	border:1px dashed #fff !important;
	margin:5px !important;
	cursor:pointer;
	-webkit-transition: all 0.4s ease;
	-moz-transition: all 0.4s ease;
	-o-transition: all 0.4s ease;
}
.filetype {
	color:#fff;
	font-size:8px;
	text-transform:uppercase;
	padding:2px;
	display:block;
	text-align:center;
}

.wordbreak {
	word-wrap: break-word;
	white-space: normal;
}
.proshare_thumb_view:hover {
	border:1px dashed #cecece !important;
}
.proshare_sf_ov {
	background:#fff !important;
	padding-top:36px;
}
.proshare_sf_cont, #o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417, #o_5f330388_8fea_4db8_9982_a03c81fa080b {
	background:none !important;
	border:none !important;
}
.proshare_sf_cont, #o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417 .info{
	display:none;

}
.sf-readonly .info {
	display:none;
}
/*#o_0e8ca073_adaa_4c19_9194_fb6fd41e6c1d*/
.sf-readonly #o_febe42b5_37ee_417a_a1b0_4e5800f7d9ae  {
	height: 605px !important;
}



#o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417 .items, #o_5f330388_8fea_4db8_9982_a03c81fa080b .items{
		background:none !important;
}

#o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417 .info, #o_5f330388_8fea_4db8_9982_a03c81fa080b .info{
background:#f5f5e9 url("/d8cb76f4-8506-4d0c-845a-92ea199b34b0.png") !important;
background-repeat:repeat-x !important;
background-position:bottom !important;
min-height:60px;
}
#o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417 .info .metafields, #o_5f330388_8fea_4db8_9982_a03c81fa080b .info .metafields{
		background:none !important;
		border-bottom:none !important;
		width:800px;
		margin-left:180px;
}
#o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417 .info .metafields .meta, #o_5f330388_8fea_4db8_9982_a03c81fa080b .info .metafields .meta{
		border-right:none !important;
		border-bottom:1px dashed #c4c4ba;
		line-height:1.5;
		padding-bottom:4px;
		padding-left:0px !important;
		margin-bottom:8px;
		width:370px !important;
		margin:12px;
}
#o_ab6b074b_07e3_46dd_9283_c772e75ef417 .info .metafields .meta span, #o_5f330388_8fea_4db8_9982_a03c81fa080b .info .metafields .meta span{
		height:23px;
		overflow:hidden;
		background:yellow-bright;
}

.proshare_sm_list ul li {
padding-top:15px;
padding-bottom:15px;
padding-left:26px;
font-size:12px;
cursor:pointer;
border-top:1px solid #fff;
border-bottom:1px solid #dcdcd1;
background:#f5f5e9 url("/71129077-2e5f-4323-9061-81e10dbb1751.png") !important;
background-repeat:no-repeat !important;
background-position:5px 15px !important;
}
.proshare_sm_list ul .active {
background:#ffffff url("/5ae599b4-95c1-4f13-a817-5d4fe38cf9e9.png") !important;
background-repeat:no-repeat !important;
background-position:5px 15px !important;
border-bottom:1px solid #fff;
}




/* Top plugins panel
--------------------------------------------------- */

.macro-cont {
	/*background: url("/db41f436-60f7-4d1e-bc08-91af2405e287.png");*/
	background-color: #F5F5F5;
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:bottom !important;

}

.top-macros-buttons {
	overflow:hidden !important;
	margin-top:5px !important;
	cursor:pointer;
	text-align:center;
}
.top-macros-buttons img {
	height:32px !important;
}
.macr-label-but{
	width:90px!important;
	overflow:hidden !important;
	height:14px;
	display:block;
}

.top-menu-item div {
	overflow:hidden !important;
}
.img-grid {
	width:32px;
	height:32px;
	overflow:hidden !important;
	cursor:pointer;
}
.img-grid img {
	width:13px;
	height:13px;
	display:block;
	float:left;
	padding:1px;
	position:relative;
}
.top-menu-item p {
	padding:0px;
	margin:0px;
 }
.lt-ie10 .ov-item {position:relative; display:block; float:left !important;}
.lt-ie10 .img-grid img {float:left !important;}
/*--------------------------------------------------*/

.pop-bg-up{
background: url("/9f4fd424-ff59-4c14-98ca-fd80ea83644a.png") !important;
}
.popdown .pop-bg{
background: url("/9f4fd424-ff59-4c14-98ca-fd80ea83644a.png");
}

.popdown .pop-caption{
color:#fff;
font-size:18px;
font-weight:bold;
}

.popdown .list-datatable table {
border:0px;
color:#fff;
height:0px !important;
}
.popdown .list-datatable table tr {
height:26px !important;
overflow:hidden !important;

display:block;
vertical-align:top;
}

.popdown .list-datatable table td{
border:0px;
color:#fff;
font-size:14px;
height:26px !important;
overflow:hidden !important;

/*connection page*/
.form_connection{
	border:2px solid #dcdcdc;
	background:#eee;
}

.form_connection_state{
	border:2px solid #dcdcdc;
	background:#fff;
}

.container_disable{
	opacity:0.8;
	background:#eee;
}

.failed{
	color:#d0302d;
	background: url("/386c49e1-74b1-4a10-ae1f-a8e128a27e02.res") no-repeat;
}

.success{
	color:#3b7820;
	background: url("/277b6934-3457-4242-bc58-d04f8b07f7e6.res") no-repeat;
}

.failed span, .success span{
	margin-left:20px;
}

.rdb_scheme div div label{
	font-size:16px;
	font-weight:bold;
	margin-left:8px;
}

/*start button*/
.top_start_container{
	height:7px;
	background: #262626;
}

.first_block{
	background:#333333 !important;
}


.block_start_container{
	height:35px;
	background:url("/51df0078-c047-4209-986a-c0b654cd65f0.res") repeat-x;
	color:#888;

}

.app_start_container{
	height:30px;
	background:url("/8a311fd7-65ec-400d-97ec-5609d2c2c2a4.res") repeat-x !important;
}
.app_start_container:hover, .app-like:hover {
	background:#484848 !important;
}

.switch-to {
	background:url("/b7401246-6550-4083-bd79-1f624c8e24aa.res") no-repeat left 5px !important;
	padding-left:30px;
}
.current-user {
	background:url("/670cdba4-2465-402a-924e-e70351b6e940.res") no-repeat left 5px !important;
	padding-left:30px;
}

.center_align_block, .center_align_app {
	margin-left:22px;
}

.block_start_container a, .app_start_container a, .block_start_container a:visited, .app_start_container a:visited{
	font-size:12px;
	color:#fff;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.center_align_app{
	padding-top:4px;
	clear:both;
}

.center_align_app a, .center_align_app img {
	display:block;
	float:left;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.center_align_app a {
	padding-left: 6px;
	width: 215px;
}
.center_align_app img {
	width:24px;
	height:24px;
}

.center_align_block{
	padding-top:10px;
	clear:both;
}

.center_align_block a, .center_align_block img {
	display:block;
	float:left;
	line-height: 24px;
	margin-top: -4px;
}
.center_align_block a {
	padding-left: 6px;
	width: 215px;
}

.bottom_start_container{
	height:13px;
	background: #262626;
}

.throb-test {opacity:0; position:fixed !important; left:50% !important; top:50% !important; margin-left:-14px; margin-top:-14px; -webkit-transition: opacity 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: opacity 0.3s ease; background:rgba(255,255,255,0.5) !important; z-index:999;}
.lt-ie10 .throb-test {display:none;}
.loading .throb-test {opacity:0.9;}
.lt-ie10 .loading .throb-test {display:block;}
